item.title: Getting Started with Pry Debug in 5 minutes
item.description: When you’re banging your head against the wall trying to fix a bug, the last thing you want is having to stop and learn how to use the debugging tool. The last time this happened, you added require 'pry' on a ruby file but quickly realized you didn’t know the available commands. If only there was a way for you to quickly learn how to use Pry… Well, there is now!
